text:
[Verse]
Wake up it's a new day
Sky is turning blue
Feel the morning breeze
Life is calling you

[Verse 2]
Step into the sunlight
Chase away the night
Every moment's bright
Everything's just right

[Chorus]
Catch the sunrise
Feel the day rise
Leave your cares behind
Future's in your mind

[Verse 3]
Birds singing in trees
Whispers in the air
Joy is all you need
Love is everywhere

[Chorus]
Catch the sunrise
Feel the day rise
Leave your cares behind
Future's in your mind

[Bridge]
All the dreams you see
Are within your reach
Smile and just believe
In the life you seek
title: Catch the Sunrise
